name: Death in the Gulf Stream
description: The Death in the Gulf Stream cocktail was a favorite drink of Ernest Hemingway's.
recipeIngredient: Peeled zest and 1 tablespoon juice from 1 lime

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a tall chimney-style glass nearly full of crushed ice. Add the lime peel, lime juice, bitters, and simple syrup (if using). Top with Genever and stir. Serve immediately.
